doc.name: Plot
doc.description: An event to plot the received arguments as points in a timed plotter. It implicitly contains a ptolemy.actor.lib.gui.TimedPlotter in a ptolemy.domains.modal.kernel.Configurer, so that it can reuse the function provided by the timed plotter and the timed plotter can also be configured with the configuration for this event itself. This event can receive 0 to more arguments. Each argument corresponds to a distinct data set displayed in the plotter (usually in a unique color). When this event is fired, for each arguments that can be converted into double tokens, it plots the values of those arguments in the plotter with the current model time on the x-axis.
